article.headline: South Carolina St. 70, Morgan St. 56
article.story: ORANGEBURG, S.C. (AP) -- Brian Mason tossed in 17 points and grabbed nine rebounds to lead South Carolina State to a 70-56 win over Morgan State in a Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference action Saturday. The Bulldogs (10-15, 8-7 MEAC) also got 15 points from Derrick Davis and 10 points from Chris Miller-Williams. Morgan State (10-14, 8-5) was led by Reggie Holmes, who came off the bench for 13 points. South Carolina State raced to a 29-15 at the 4:52 mark of the opening half, but Morgan State closed out the first 20 minutes with a 12-5 run to get to 34-27 at the half. South Carolina State started the second half with a 13-4 run to push their lead to 47-31 when Davis got a layup with 13:38 on the clock. The Bears got to 14 points down at 65-51, but could get no closer.
